channel.title: New for girls on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in New for girls on Game6r

item.title: Game Charming ponies
item.description: Create original horses using all available game features. Here you can choose different elements: mane, tail, eyes, clothes, accessories. Do not forget to decide on the color of the horse’s coat. If desired, you can use the random character creation function. The background can also be changed.

item.title: Game Little Kitten for Girls
item.description: In this game, gamers are invited to create their own cute kitten. To do this, at your disposal is a huge assortment of various elements of the pet’s appearance. Choose the right ears, eyes, coat color, mustache and other details. Don’t forget the outfit and accessories. There is a function of random creation of a cat.
